com.amazonaws.mobile.auth.core

Interface IdentityProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SignInProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CognitoUserPoolsSignInProvider, FacebookSignInProvider, GoogleSignInProvider

    public interface IdentityProvider
    Interface sign-in provider's supported by the IdentityManager must implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCognitoLoginKey() 
      java.lang.String getDisplayName() 
      java.lang.String getToken()
      Call getToken to retrieve the access token from successful sign-in with this provider.
      void initialize(android.content.Context context, AWSConfiguration configuration)
      Method called upon constructing an identity provider for it to handle its initialization.
      java.lang.String refreshToken()
      Refreshes the token if it has expired.
      boolean refreshUserSignInState()
      Refreshes the state of whether the user is signed-in and returns the updated state.
      void signOut()
      Call signOut to sign out of this provider.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                AWSConfiguration configuration)
        Method called upon constructing an identity provider for it to handle its initialization.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        configuration - the configuration.

      • getDisplayName

        java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Returns:
        the display name for this provider.

      • getCognitoLoginKey

        java.lang.String getCognitoLoginKey()
        Returns:
        the key used by Cognito in its login map when refreshing credentials.

      • refreshUserSignInState

        boolean refreshUserSignInState()
        Refreshes the state of whether the user is signed-in and returns the updated state. Note: This call may block, so it must not be called from the main thread.
        Returns:
        true if signed in with this provider, otherwise false.

      • getToken

        java.lang.String getToken()
        Call getToken to retrieve the access token from successful sign-in with this provider. Note: This call may block if the access token is not already cached.
        Returns:
        the access token suitable for use with Cognito.

      • refreshToken

        java.lang.String refreshToken()
        Refreshes the token if it has expired. Note: this call may block due to network access, and must be called from a background thread.
        Returns:
        the refreshed access token, or null if the token cannot be refreshed.

      • signOut

        void signOut()
        Call signOut to sign out of this provider.
